name: Quant.Fun
description: Quant.Fun is a retail-friendly onchain hedge fund platform, that leverages agentic AI to help users invest wisely. Their team intends to build an easy to use vaults platform on Solana that allows for non-crypto-natives to access onchain structured products, which include staking, stablecoin yield, and quantitative strategies. Quant.Fun also is developing an agentic AI to assist users in understanding financial choices on their platform.
